News

04 August 2023

The paper “Evaluation of Optical Character Recognition System dealing with Misinformation in Portuguese” was accepted to be published in SIBGRAPI 2023. Congrats Yago Santos and the team!!!

04 August 2023

The paper “Presenter-Centric Image Collection and Annotation: Enhancing Accessibility for the Visually Impaired” was accepted to be published in SIBGRAPI 2023. Congrats Luísa Ferreira and the team!!!

04 August 2023

Our lab had 2 papers accpeted in SIBGRAPI 2023 in a total of 3 papers submitted!!!

03 August 2023

The paper “ImageFactCk.BR: Um Repositório de Imagens para a Detecção de Desinformação Disseminada em Plataformas Digitais” was accepted to be published in SBBD DSW 2023. Congrats Yago Santos and the team!!!

03 August 2023

Our site is alive!
